mapper.update: update deliver set orderid = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deliverman = #{deliverman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where wlid = #{wlid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select wlid, orderid, deliverman, status, date, location from deliver
